title: Our Medical Services
subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare services tailored to meet the diverse needs of our patients and community

services.title: Cardiology
services.description: Advanced heart and cardiovascular care including diagnostic testing, treatment, and preventive services for patients of all ages.

services.title: Internal Medicine
services.description: Expert diagnosis and treatment of diseases affecting internal organs, with focus on patient wellness and chronic disease management.

services.title: Physical Rehabilitation
services.description: Specialized therapy programs designed to restore function, improve mobility, and enhance quality of life after injury or illness.

services.title: Neurology
services.description: Specialized care for neurological disorders including stroke, epilepsy, Parkinson's, and other neurological conditions.

services.title: Emergency Medicine
services.description: 24/7 emergency department providing immediate care and stabilization for acute medical and trauma cases.

services.title: Family Medicine
services.description: Comprehensive primary care for the entire family, focusing on prevention, education, and long-term health relationships.
